thread.title: 29 U.S. Scientists Praise Iran Nuclear Deal in Letter to Obama
thread.title_full: 29 U.S. Scientists Praise Iran Nuclear Deal in Letter to Obama

author: Andrew Hart
title: 29 U.S. Scientists Praise Iran Nuclear Deal in Letter to Obama
text:
29 U.S. Scientists Praise Iran Nuclear Deal in Letter to Obama The New York Times Posted: 08/08/2015 11:09 PM EDT 
Twenty-nine of the nation’s top scientists — including Nobel laureates, veteran makers of nuclear arms and former White House science advisers — wrote to President Obama on Saturday to praise the Iran deal, calling it innovative and stringent.
